div.head:
The MULTEXT-East lexical morphosyntactic descriptions
for Slovene and English

item: SELECT, the languages that the feature-value is appropriate for

ID, the identifier of the feature composed of the
part-of-speech code, the feature number, a period and the feature
code, e.g. id="A1.f"

list.item: VALUE, the full name of the value

tagUsage.content:
Valid morphosyntactic description for Slovene or English.
Attributes are:

item: TYPE, the part-of-speech, formally the feature-structure type
SELECT, the languages that the MSD is appropriate for

FEATS, the decomposition of the MSD into
feature-value pairs. A feature is composed of the PoS code, the
position of the attribute, the full stop, and the code of the value,
e.g. A4.p for fourth attribute of Adjectives, with value code 'p'.

content: EU MLIS project ELAN: European Language Activity Network

p:
MULTEXT-East:
      Multilingual Text Tools and Corpora for Central and Eastern
      European Languages. EU Copernicus Project COP106

Concede:
      Consortium for Central European Dictionary Encoding.
      EU Copernicus Project PL96-1142

author: Bulgarian: R.Pavlov, L.Dimitrova, L.Sinapova, K.Simov
Czech: V.Petkevič
Estonian: H.J.Kaalep
English: N.Ide, G.Priest-Dorman, T.Erjavec, T.Varadi
Hungarian: L.Tihanyi, T.Varadi
Romanian: D.Tufiş, A.M.Barbu
Slovene: T.Erjavec, P.Holozan, V.Gorjanc, M.Stabej
Croatian: M.Tadić
monogr.title: Specifications and Notation for Lexicon Encoding

change.item:
Prepared MULTEXT-East/Concede library for inclusion with
the IJS-ELAN corpus V2: deleted FS for languages other than
Slovene/English and added those that appear due to changed Slovene
specification from the FIDA project. Caveat: old and new ones are now
mixed, should be fixed.
Recoded in P4/XML and prepared V2.0 for distribution.
